definition: (name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: We replied to the enemy's attack with a barrage.
sentences.chinese: 我军以齐射的炮火回击敌军的进攻。

sentences.english: This forerunner of the musket is capable of firing deadly volleys that can pierce armour.
sentences.chinese: 这些火枪的先驱者可以射出穿透盔甲的致命齐射。

sentences.english: The plant makes electronic components for cars and consumer devices.
sentences.chinese: 该工厂主要生产齐射电子元件和消费电子产品。

sentences.english: SALVO FIRE is the simultaneous firing of all guns ready and aimed at the same target.
sentences.chinese: 齐射同口径火炮炮塔备便并同时瞄准射击同一目标。

sentences.english: The performance won a salvo of applause.
sentences.chinese: 我们朝发出声音的地方进行一次齐射。

sentences.english: We pooped off a salvo in the direction of the sound.
sentences.chinese: 我们朝发出声音的地方进行一次齐射。

sentences.english: The process is continued until the target is located within the pattern.
sentences.chinese: 这个过程要持续进行到目标位于齐射弹着样态中为止。

definition: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
